data.title: 15 Best Pinnacle Studio Alternatives
data.meta_description: 15 Alternatives to Pinnacle Studio you must know. With reviews, features, pros & cons of Pinnacle Studio. Find your best replacement here. Searching for suitable software was never easier.
data.text:
Pinnacle Studio

Description

Create stunning movies with our sophisticated video editor! Choose the new Pinnacle Studio 22 Ultimate for maximum video editing power with new Color Grading controls, Three- and Four-Point Editing, MultiCam Capture Lite, Split Screen Video with Keyframes, and 360 video editing controls. Learn more!

Platforms

Links

Alternatives to Pinnacle Studio

Avidemux

Opensource

Avidemux is a free video editor designed for simple cutting, filtering and encoding tasks. It supports many file types, including AVI, DVD compatible MPEG files, MP4 and ASF, using a variety of cod...

{{ alternatives[0].votes }}

VirtualDub

Free

VirtualDub is a video capture and editing tool used by professionals that strips out some of the unnecessary bells and whistles offered in more fully packaged platforms and focuses on providing a s...

Adobe Premiere Pro is a fully featured video editing platform built to meet the needs of creative professionals working in the video production industry.

Lightworks

Freemium

Shotcut

Opensource

Free

Freemium

Commercial

PowerDirector is the best video editing software. Easy to use, with pro features and many awards. Discover why it’s rated the #1 Windows Video Editor.
